::: {.column width="55%"}
Code Club will restart for the 2026 spring semester on **January 26^th^**,
meeting on **Mondays at 4 pm**.

Please **sign up** [using this Google form](https://forms.gle/eYkMvmJShrcANUrt5)
to be added to our mailing list and receive meeting locations and link info!
*(We have a mailing lists for the '25-'26 academic calendar,*
*so you don't need to sign up if you did so for the fall semester,*
*but should do so if you signed up before.)*

**If you are a total R beginner**, we highly recommend that you take the 
"R for Reproducibility" workshop on Friday February 13^th^:
[more information and registration](https://library.osu.edu/events/r-for-scientific-reproducibility).
If you prefer self-study, please take a look at the
[material from last year's version of the same workshop](https://osu-codeclub.github.io/carpentries-aug-2025/)
before joining Code Club!

<hr style="height:1pt; visibility:hidden;" />
:::
